alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 3:54PM MDT until April 04 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SUNDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 10 inches, locally up to 15 inches benches and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...From midnight Sunday night to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. The Monday morning commute will likely be impacted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be heavy at times Sunday night into Monday morning. Snow intensity may decrease early Monday afternoon before increasing once again late Monday afternoon into Tuesday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx.
